name: UTouchInterface
doc: Defines an interface by which touch input can be controlled using any number of buttons and virtual joysticks

ActiveOpacity: Opacity (0.0 - 1.0) of all controls while any control is active
InactiveOpacity: Opacity (0.0 - 1.0) of all controls while no controls are active
TimeUntilDeactive: How long after user interaction will all controls fade out to Inactive Opacity
TimeUntilReset: How long after going inactive will controls reset/recenter themselves (0.0 will disable this feature)
ActivationDelay: How long after joystick enabled for touch (0.0 will disable this feature)
bPreventRecenter: Prevent joystick re-centering and moving from Center through user taps
StartupDelay: Delay at startup before virtual joystick is drawn
